data.subject: Pod Hates Us All
data.lyric:
Space and time are open to he
 who has seen this entity
 jibbering gelatinous mass
 of puss and mucu

data.subject: Killing Fields
data.lyric:
Disgusting slaves procreate
 Outnumber masters 10 to 1
 Spreading like the caustic flame
 Wandering

data.subject: EyeHateSalt
data.lyric:
Cruel weapons of the human bastard
 sprinking death from up on high
 Eyestalks recoiling as my slime

data.subject: Slime Traveler
data.lyric:
Wasteland stretching endless miles
 What we've left behind
 Nothing but the sound of solitary slithe

data.subject: All Shell Perish
data.lyric:
Beyond batrachian bulwarks, before the black gates
 The great one lies dormant, forever he waits

data.subject: Pax Aranea
data.lyric:
Mucus trail of viscous rime
 Into her woven halls
 Her children, cover the walls
 Watched by ten tho

data.subject: Salters Of Madness
data.lyric:
Forgotten unconcious ghosts of aeons lay
 In chasms cold as the deepest grave
 A charnel cosmic wind

data.subject: Invertahate
data.lyric:
A dark, defiling spectre from the wastes
 Horrendous terror from the Tundras of Eurgh
 His fringe en

data.subject: Slimewave Zero
data.lyric:
Civilisation, like locusts clad in suits they come
 with their manifests in hand, engineered to corr

data.subject: The Sound Of Mucus
data.lyric:
Starship Earth five billion years
 Life support malfunction
 Wreckage adrift in outer space
 Populat
